task.title: Create a Publication in Oxygen Content Fusion
task.shortdesc: This task will show you how to create a publication in Oxygen Content Fusion.

prereq.p: You must have created a project in Oxygen Content Fusion.

context.p: Learn how to create a publication that will be used to deliver the content of your project in Oxygen Content Fusion.

step.cmd: Click the "publications" tab on the left of your project homepage

info.note: Each tab tells you what is it when you hover over it with your mouse

image.alt: picture of a project's homepage with an arrow pointing to the "publications" tab
picture of the publication management page with an arrow pointing to "new project"

step.cmd: Select your ditamap from the file list

info.note: Applicable only if you are filtering content

image.alt: picture of the pop-up that appears when creating a new publication with an arrow pointing to the "create" button
